sentence.Network_en: Certain areas have been declared off limits to servicemen.
sentence.Network_cn: 已经宣布一些地区军人不得出入。

sentence.Network_en: Cream cleansers are totally off limits for oily skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 油性皮肤不能使用洁面霜。

sentence.Network_en: A one-mile area around the wreck is still off limits.
sentence.Network_cn: 沉船方圆一英里内仍然禁止进入。
